text.text_translated:
I am a member of the Campaign to Stop Killer Robots.  
Military machines are used today.  
These include drones, gun turrets and sentry robots.  
They can kill people with very little human input.  
The next step is autonomous murder robots.  
These robots follow orders but decide who to kill.  
That is wrong and dangerous for people.  
We must be careful.  
We must think about the jobs we give robots.

best_attempt.text_translated:
I am a member of the Campaign to Stop Killer Robots.  
This campaign wants to stop killer robots.  
Forget the scary movie picture of a robot stepping on heads.  
Today the army uses machines like drones, gun turrets and sentry robots.  
These machines can kill people.  
They need very little human help.  
The next step is robots.  
These robots kill people by themselves.  
They follow orders but they choose who to kill.  
This would be very bad and very dangerous for all people.  
So we must be careful.  
We must think about the jobs we give to machines.
